title: I just want devourer puppy back
body: <_<  That's all I really wanted to say.

replies.body:
They should make it a keystone instead of Dark Harvest.

Dark harvest is cheesy and sucks.
This is the best idea I've read here in a long time.  Even though I used DH on every single champ I play, I'd take old sated as rune over DH any day

> [{quoted}](name=Wild Geese,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EEF0T62I,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-03T01:47:18.690+0000)
>
> They should make it a keystone instead of Dark Harvest.
> 
> Dark harvest is cheesy and sucks.

or at least have it on Dark Harvest. Make it grow bigger with each stack, then when you get 150 stacks it fuses with you like it did with Devourer

> [{quoted}](name=Wild Geese,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EEF0T62I,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-03T01:47:18.690+0000)
>
> They should make it a keystone instead of Dark Harvest.
> 
> Dark harvest is cheesy and sucks.

An actual pet keystone would be amazing for {{champion:82}} with his W
{{sticker:sg-jinx}}
iirc the wolf wasn't considered a pet

> [{quoted}](name=gabetheguy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EEF0T62I,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2018-07-04T01:20:10.152+0000)
>
> iirc the wolf wasn't considered a pet

Yeah but an actual pet keystone would be nice I mean. It could let you play champs with abilities that require an ally near in solo lanes easier.
wym cheesy
It's kinda dumb. It's an on-hit/on-attack bonus.
what's so dumb about that?

Well, let's run down the other keystone masteries in Domination:

Thunderlord's: Damage someone with 3 different, unique attacks to deal bonus damage to someone. (Fun-ish)

Predator: Enchant your boots with an active that gives you a massive boost in your ambush and first strike capability. (Heeeella fuckin fun in my personal opinion; one of my favorite keystone masteries period)

Hail of Blades: Your next 3 basic attacks have a ton of extra attack speed. (Kinda dumb too)

Now let's look at Dark Harvest.
Dark Harvest: Kill an enemy champion, large minion, or large monster to temporarily have your next on-hit deal bonus damage.
Wolf has two quotes that are unused now for when Kindred bought devourer, "Another friend" and "They will see two of me!"
What is this devourer puppy?

There used to be this jungle enchant called devourer, which you would stack by killing camps and would give you guinsoo's passive when fully stacked. When you had the item, a little puppy would follow you and get bigger as you got more stacks. So,all in al, IT WAS THE CUTEST THING.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Damn, I remember the devourer thing. Like I started league shortly before they got rid of it. But I was way too new and bad to know what it did. Kinda sad now that I missed that
I have so many memories of back then... #SatedYi4Lyfe
The puppy/worlf would disappear after you fully stacked your devourer 30 times
It wouldnt disappear per say, it would fuse with you and produce kinda a shadow of you when it triggered iirc.

Wish you could have that over the current Guinsoo.

Tbh, i wish Monster camp buffs would return while we're at it.

Ooooh can we also get that bug where a few champs would unintentionally get a puppy pack as well?
Honestly best bug of all time.
Devourer {{champion:78}} sucks, better use Cinderhulk or Warrior
I'll absolutely take anything else I've ever seen in this game before i see devourer back
Bring back the pupper. He was a good boy.
My name is a tribute to that dog. I miss it so much.
they should give you the old devourer puppy back with predator, have it show up when you have the active available :/

But...bears care.

{{champion:106}} {{champion:77}}

It was removed because Devourer was broken op when finished, but left the jungle starved if left unfinished and their team lacking a player. The item required a minimum of 18 minutes of farming and an average of 20 minutes of farming to become "sated".

It was so oppressive that even jungle that don't benefit from it could build it and dominate entire matches. But entire teams would complain about having no jungle for entire matches because their jungle was trying to get Devourer sated.

It was just a toxic item that was later converted into a crappy rune that doesn't help you or your team for 30 minutes instead of 20 minutes.

times have changed since then.  now you get {{item:3095}}+ {{item:3147}}  combo.  build this on any champ and 1 shot any carry easy pz.  
very very healthy meta.  not at all toxic :D

"It was so oppressive that even jungle that don't benefit from it could build it and dominate entire matches."

also fyi, it was only effective for champions with onhits, and against braindead cc meatbag tanks.
Minimum of 12, average of 16. Not sure what terrible players you were with who didn't stack it under 18.

YYYYEEESSSSSSSSSSSSSSS!!!!

FK U RITO PLZ BRING IT BACK
{{champion:19}} {{item:3070}}
